attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am unforntunatly in the situation where I am in debt and my only solution is to declare myself Bankrupt.

I am in debt and the catch is you need £450 to process the bankrupcy though the court.

Hundreds of people are suffering endless sleepless nights, worrying about a knock on the door baliffs etc.

If you have no money and need to declare yourself Bankrupt where are you supposed to find £450 from.

Please sign to help all others in the same situation.

Thanks

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
